Resources NGO Forum Tools

Some of NGO Forum Tools.

1

Statutes of Operations

This the binding agreement that describes and govern the South Sudan Forum

View Resource

2

Membership Registration

Register with NGO Forum and join many other NGOs and other partners.

View Resource

3

Resilience Exchange Network

A platform through which NGOs share knowledge, expertise and learning on resilience programming.

View Resource

4

Documents Repository

NGO Forum repository of government circulars, coordination, legislations and regulatory guidance documents.

View Resource

5

Communication Portal

This a message board for all NGO Forum members.

View Resource

6

INGO Operational Presence 3W

3W Data Visualization for International NGOs at County Level

View Resource

7

NNGO Operational Presence 3W

3W Data Visualization for National NGOs at County Level

View Resource

8

National NGO Capicity Development Tool

A tool that helps national organizations vet themselves and identify the areas of institutional development and support as well as develop a trajectory for organizational growth within South Sudanâ€™s operating environment

View Resource

9

Security Incidents

This is a form to report the Security incidents. Your message should be short and to the point, providing the 6Ws. Who, where, when, what happened, what you did, what you need.

View Resource

10

South Sudan Knowledge Network

The South Sudan Knowledge Network is an information platform where research on South Sudan is collected and housed. It is a one stop shop for research conducted on South Sudan that is available for public access.

View Resource

11

Access Constrains

Report your Access Constrains

View Resource

12

Job Advertisements

This a message board where our partners submit job applications.

View Resource

13

Courses & Trainings

This a message board where Courses and Trainings are advertised.

View Resource

14

Tender Advertisements

This a message board where our partners submit tender advertisements.

View Resource
